00014     FindableTrackResult::FindableTrackResult() :
00015         TObject() {  
00016     }

00018     FindableTrackResult::~FindableTrackResult() {}

00020     void FindableTrackResult::setResult(Strategy strategy, bool isFindable) { 
00021         
00022         switch (strategy) { 
00023             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_NONE: 
00024                 break;
00025             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_4S: 
00026                 is4sFindable_ = isFindable;
00027                 break;
00028             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_3S1A: 
00029                 is3s1aFindable_ = isFindable;
00030                 break;
00031             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_2S2A: 
00032                 is2s2aFindable_ = isFindable;
00033                 break;
00034             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_2A:
00035                 is2aFindable_ = isFindable; 
00036                 break;
00037             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_2S:
00038                 is2sFindable_ = isFindable; 
00039                 break;
00040             case FindableTrackResult::STRATEGY_3S:
00041                 is3sFindable_ = isFindable; 
00042                 break;
00043         }
00044     }
00045 
00046     void FindableTrackResult::Clear(Option_t *option) { 
00047         simParticle_    = nullptr;
00048         is4sFindable_   = false; 
00049         is3s1aFindable_ = false;
00050         is2s2aFindable_ = false;
00051         is2aFindable_   = false; 
00052         is2sFindable_   = false;
00053         is3sFindable_   = false;
00054     }
00055 
00056     void FindableTrackResult::Print(Option_t *option) { 
00057         std::cout << "[ FindableTrackResult ]: "
00058                   << "Sim particle PDG ID: " 
00059                   << static_cast<SimParticle*>(simParticle_.GetObject())->getPdgID() << "\n" 
00060                   << "\t4s Findable: "   << is4sFindable_    << "\n" 
00061                   << "\t3s1a Findable: " << is3s1aFindable_  << "\n"
00062                   << "\t2s2a Findable: " << is2s2aFindable_  << "\n"
00063                   << "\t2a Findable: "   << is2aFindable_  << "\n"
00064                   << "\t2s Findable: "   << is2sFindable_  << "\n"
00065                   << "\t3s Findable: "   << is3sFindable_  << "\n"
00066                   << std::endl;
00067     }
